BR_text.BRsummary: UG relative links don't work well on apple.github.io/
BR_text.BRdescription:
The user guide has many links to specific subtitles in other UG pages. For example is the link at the bottom of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/tree/master/userguide/image_classifier#advanced-usage>https://github.com/apple/turicreate/tree/master/userguide/image_classifier#advanced-usage</denchmark-link>
  correctly links to the "Accessing attributes of the model" section in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/blob/master/userguide/supervised-learning/linear-regression.md#linregr-model-access/>https://github.com/apple/turicreate/blob/master/userguide/supervised-learning/linear-regression.md#linregr-model-access/</denchmark-link>
 .
 However, the rendered counterpart of this page, <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/image_classifier/>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/image_classifier/</denchmark-link>
 , tries to link to <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/supervised-learning/linear-regression.html#linregr-model-access>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/supervised-learning/linear-regression.html#linregr-model-access</denchmark-link>
 , while the correct link is in fact <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/supervised-learning/linear-regression.html#accessing-attributes-of-the-model>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/supervised-learning/linear-regression.html#accessing-attributes-of-the-model</denchmark-link>
  - ending up at the top of that page, instead of the relevant section.
 This is just one example I've encountered - but from poking around it seems to be happening across the board
